column2: this was a fantastic tour of the acropolis. our guide christos was amazing, smart, and very friendly.
i am very happy and greatful to have been part of this tour...kostas was an amazing guide and a pleasant and smart person. i highly recommend doing this tour.

Great bike tour. Filipa was amazing. Very knowledgeable and friendly.

I highly recommend.

Regards,

Nick
Punctual. Safe. Friendly. Good price. Couldn't ask for anything more. Thanks Angelo. See you again next time I'm in Cabarete. Nick.

I stayed in Studio C. It was good enough to have a comfortable sleep and showers and chill/relax at times. But I did not spend much time outside of sleeping and bathing inside the hotel/room. It is not a 4 or 5 star place. But the price is good for what you get. Some noise at times from something going on behind my unit outside, and intermittent internet connectivity at times, but overall good host, felt very safe, etc. Would definitely consider staying here again in the future. Nick.
